title: Error during patching/scanning files
body:
Hello,

From yesterday I am facing an error, after patch 6.16 I cannot anymore play the game, i've got an error which dont allow me to download patch 6.16. And no, it is not because my connection is bad nor because something is wrong on my side, it is clearly smth from Riot side... Please tell me what can I do except repair. i tried it already. If you need any logs please tell me which and where I can find it.



Many thanks,
Best regards,
Scullion, playing since s1

replies.body: At this point, your patcher is trying to download files but your network is unable to maintain a connection.  I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up for good.  A repair wouldn't necessary fix this since it's an issue with your connection and not game files.  Hope that helps!
